body_html:
@depauwjimmy - Please try with Bazel 0.15.0 and GCC 4.8 with CUDA/cuDNN 9/7. This is the tested combination and it should work.

Also request you to fill this template in order to continue assisting on this issue. If this issue no longer persists, feel free to close. Thanks !

body:
@depauwjimmy  - Please try with Bazel 0.15.0 and GCC 4.8 with CUDA/cuDNN  9/7. This is the tested combination and it should work. 

Also request you to fill [this template](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/new/choose) in order to continue assisting on this issue. If this issue no longer persists, feel free to close. Thanks !
